languages.text: "Если бы. Еще и в варпе — но тут заслуга больше Навигатора, не моя. Варп дерьмо то еще — тут сколько бы лет за штурвалом ни отлетал, каждый раз что-то новенькое подкидывают. Так что мое дело маленькое — следить за системами, идти по проложенному курсу и не выделываться, когда из Святилища Навигатора команды приходят".

"I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."
languages.original_text: "Если бы. Еще и в варпе — но тут заслуга больше Навигатора, не моя. Варп дерьмо то еще — тут сколько бы лет за штурвалом ни отлетал, каждый раз что-то новенькое подкидывают. Так что мое дело маленькое — следить за системами, идти по проложенному курсу и не выделываться, когда из Святилища Навигатора команды приходят".

traits.locale_text: "If only. In the warp, too, but that's largely Navigator's job so I cannot take the credit. The warp is shit, no matter how many years I spend at the wheel, it keeps vomits up something unexpected. So my task is simple — I watch the systems, follow the charted route and make no fuss when orders arrive from the navigation chamber."

"If only. In the warp, too, but that's largely Navigator's job so I cannot take the credit. The warp is shit, no matter how many years I spend at the wheel, it keeps vomits up something unexpected. So my task is simple — I watch the systems, follow the charted route and make no fuss when orders arrive from the navigation chamber."

"If only. In the warp too, but that's largely Navigator's job, so I can't take the credit. The warp is shit, no matter how many years I spend at the wheel, it keeps vomiting up something unexpected. So, my task is simple — I watch the systems, follow the charted route and make no fuss when orders arrive from the navigation chamber."

"If only. In the warp too, but that's largely Navigator's job, so I can't take the credit. The warp is shit, no matter how many years I spend at the wheel, it keeps vomiting up something unexpected. So, my task is simple — I watch the systems, follow the charted route and make no fuss when orders arrive from the navigation chamber."

"I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

"I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

languages.text: “要是只用在真实世界开船就好了。不行，在亚空间的时候，也得我来操作，不过大部分的事情都是导航者做的。亚空间简直是一团噩梦，总是有新的玩意儿突然蹿出来。虽然我已经开了这么多年船，但那些经验在亚空间里屁用没有。我在亚空间里没什么事要干，我就负责监控系统，沿着航线图上的路线前进。万一导航者圣所那边来了的新的命令，我也别大惊小怪。”
languages.original_text: "I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

traits.locale_text: “要是只用在真实世界开船就好了。不行，在亚空间的时候，也得我来操作，不过大部分的事情都是导航者做的。亚空间简直是一团噩梦，总是有新的玩意儿突然蹿出来。虽然我已经开了这么多年船，但那些经验在亚空间里屁用没有。我在亚空间里没什么事要干，我就负责监控系统，沿着航线图上的路线前进。万一导航者圣所那边来了的新的命令，我也别大惊小怪。”

languages.text: «Ojalá fuera mi único trabajo. También me toca dirigirla a través de la disformidad, pero la mayor parte del mérito en esa parte recae sobre la Navegante. La disformidad es una pesadilla y siempre ofrece alguna nueva atrocidad. Mis años de experiencia son inútiles ahí dentro. Mi labor es bien pequeña: vigilo los sistemas, sigo la ruta trazada y no protesto cuando el sanctum de navegantes envía nuevas órdenes por enésima vez».
languages.original_text: "I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá fuera mi único trabajo. También me toca dirigirla a través de la disformidad, pero la mayor parte del mérito en esa parte recae sobre la Navegante. La disformidad es una pesadilla y siempre ofrece alguna nueva atrocidad. Mis años de experiencia son inútiles ahí dentro. Mi labor es bien pequeña: vigilo los sistemas, sigo la ruta trazada y no protesto cuando el sanctum de navegantes envía nuevas órdenes por enésima vez».

languages.text: 「それが私の唯一の仕事であればと思っています。歪みの中でで舵を取るのは私ですが、その功績はほとんど航宙士のものです。歪みとは悪夢のようなもので、常に未知のものが飛び出してくる――長年の経験など何の意味も成さないのです。私の果たす役割は極わずか。システムを監視し、描かれた航路に従うだけです。それから、航宙士のサンクトゥムから新しい指令が来ても、怒りをぶちまけたりしないことですね」
languages.original_text: "I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

traits.locale_text: 「それが私の唯一の仕事であればと思っています。ワープの中でで舵を取るのは私ですが、その功績はほとんどナヴィゲイターのものです。ワープは悪夢のようなもので、常に新しいものが出てきます。私が長年にわたって行ってきたことは、そこでは何の意味もないのです。私の果たす役割は極わずか。システムを監視し、海図に書かれた航路に従うだけです。それから、航宙士のサンクトゥムから新しい指令が来ても、騒ぎ立てないことですね」

languages.text: "Ich wünschte, das wäre meine einzige Aufgabe. Ich muss es auch durch den Warp lenken, aber dafür ist in erster Linie die Navigatorin verantwortlich. Der Warp ist ein Albtraum, bringt ständig etwas Neues hervor ... all meine Jahre als Steuermann sind da drin nichts wert. Ich muss nicht viel tun ... ich überwache nur unsere Systeme, folge der vorgegebenen Route und rege mich nicht auf, wenn neue Befehle aus dem Sanctum der Navigatorin kommen."
languages.original_text: "I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wünschte, das wäre meine einzige Aufgabe. Ich muss es auch durch den Warp lenken, aber dafür ist in erster Linie die Navigatorin verantwortlich. Der Warp ist ein Albtraum, bringt ständig etwas Neues hervor ... all meine Jahre als Steuermann sind da drin nichts wert. Ich muss nicht viel tun ... ich überwache nur unsere Systeme, folge der vorgegebenen Route und rege mich nicht auf, wenn neue Befehle aus dem Sanctum der Navigatorin kommen."

languages.text: « Si seulement j'avais que ça à faire. Parce que je dois aussi le guider au travers du Warp, même si c'est la navigatrice qui en récolte les lauriers. Le Warp est un cauchemar. Chaque traversée nous réserve de nouvelles surprises... et toutes mes années passées à la barre ne me sont d'aucune aide. Mon rôle est modeste. Je garde un œil sur nos systèmes, je suis la route tracée et je ne fais pas d'histoire quand je reçois de nouveaux ordres du sanctum de navigation. »
languages.original_text: "I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."

traits.locale_text: « Si seulement j'avais que ça à faire. Parce que je dois aussi le guider au travers du Warp, même si c'est la navigatrice qui en récolte les lauriers. Le Warp est un cauchemar. Chaque traversée nous réserve de nouvelles surprises... et toutes mes années passées à la barre ne me sont d'aucune aide. Mon rôle est modeste. Je garde un œil sur nos systèmes, je suis la route tracée et je ne fais pas d'histoire quand je reçois de nouveaux ordres du sanctum de navigation. »

languages.text: "Keşke tek işim bu olsa. Gemiye öteboyutta da yön vermem gerekiyor ama o hususta işin çoğu Rotacı'nın sırtında. Öteboyut tam bir kâbus, ne çıkacağı belli olmuyor. Dümen başında geçirdiğim onca yılın orada hiçbir anlamı yok. Bana düşen iş çok değil aslında: Sadece sistemlerimizi izliyorum, çizilen rotayı takip ediyorum ve Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndan yeni emirler geldiğinde ortalığı velveleye vermiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I wish that was my only job. I have to steer her through the warp too, but most of the credit for that goes to the Navigator. The warp's a nightmare, always tossing up something new — all my years at the helm, they count for nothing in there. My part's small enough — I just monitor our systems, follow the charted route, and I don't kick up a fuss when new orders come in from the Navigator's Sanctum."
